function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air exchange in civil constructions","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne contagious diseases propagation","Mitigation":"Installation of ventilation systems and air purifiers, regular maintenance of HVAC systems","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems","People":"Occupants of buildings, construction workers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, construction companies, facility management companies"},{"Description":"Overcrowding and sedentarity in lockdown contributing to non-communicable diseases","Impact":"Increased prevalence of chronic diseases and mental disorders","Mitigation":"Promotion of physical activity, healthy diet, and mental health support, enforcement of restrictions on gathering size","Technologies":"Telehealth services, remote monitoring devices, virtual exercise programs","People":"Locked-down population, individuals with pre-existing conditions, children","Owner":"Health authorities, community organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Housing crisis due to deteriorating real estate assets","Impact":"Exacerbation of housing-related health and social issues, increased risk of infectious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Renovation and maintenance of public and private real estate, investment in affordable housing, urban planning for healthy built environments","Technologies":"Green building materials, energy-efficient systems, affordable housing initiatives","People":"Residents of deteriorating buildings, vulnerable populations, homeless individuals","Owner":"Real estate developers, government housing agencies, local governments"}]}
